entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. High minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
